meanings.sent1: The flower had a funnelform shape.
meanings.sent2: The pitcher had a funnelform spout for pouring.
meanings.sent3: The funnelform hat made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: Her hair, twisted and funnelform, defied gravity.
meanings.sent5: The funnelform clouds gathered ominously in the sky.

meanings.definition: Having the form of a funnel.
meanings.sent2: The funnelform tube directed the liquid smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The funnelform cake was a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: His voice echoed in the funnelform hallway.
meanings.sent5: The funnelform shadows elongated as the sun set.
